Title: Relates to franchise tax on banking corporations
Summary: Reinstates a bank tax based on the highest of four bases: a tax on allocated entire net income, a tax on allocated alternative entire net income, a tax on allocated taxable assets, or a fixed dollar minimum tax; prohibits banks from segregating their income and capital into business and investment varieties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to franchise tax on banking corporations
